item.description:
Since founding Stone Brewing Company in 1996, Greg Koch has grown the brewery from a tiny startup into one of the fastest-growing and highest-rated breweries in the world. Brewing a projected 150,000 barrels in 2011, Stone is the 14th largest craft brewery in the United States, a position it achieved without ever advertising, discounting, or compromising.

Join MassChallenge and Pintley as Greg discusses beer, entrepreneurship, and sustainability. Greg has been called one of the world's most engaging entrepreneurs, and you won't want to miss this talk (or the afterparty)! Grab your free tickets here: http://stonemasschall...
item.name: Greg Koch & Stone Brewing @ MassChallenge
